title: Textile, 17th–19th century
medium: Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Four men and two dogs attacking a bear who has apparently killed a man who is lying underneath him. There is a small town in the distance. The design is repeated in a brick arrangement.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 17th–19th century.
17th–19th century. Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-379.
